title: New: NIGHTLY – XO
content:
Hints of The Neighbourhood, The 1975 and Walk The Moon on this debut offering from Nashville (?) duo NIGHTLY.

XO might play a little to the ‘fuck-boi’ image that Drake fulfils on VIEWS, and perhaps teeters a little between the line dividing sickly sweet and realistically relatable, but hey, it’s a great pop song. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
